scripts.codegen: rm -rf ./generated && graph codegen subgraph.mainnet.yaml && node genParserData.js
scripts.codegen-testnet: rm -rf ./generated && graph codegen subgraph.testnet.yaml && node genParserData.js
scripts.test: yarn test:errors && yarn test:sync && yarn test:withoutStatus
scripts.test:hosted: yarn test:errors && yarn test:sync && yarn test:withoutStatus --testPathIgnorePatterns addressShares balances
scripts.test:totals: yarn test:sync && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest tests/totalPooledEth.test.js tests/totalShares.test.js
scripts.deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ lidofinance/lido subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-testnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ lidofinance/lido-testnet subgraph.testnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: env-cmd --use-shell graph deploy --node '$GRAPH_NODE' --ipfs '$GRAPH_IPFS' lidofinance/lido-v2 subgraph.mainnet.yaml -l v2.0.0
scripts.deploy-local-testnet: env-cmd --use-shell graph deploy --node '$GRAPH_NODE' --ipfs '$GRAPH_IPFS' lidofinance/lido-testnet-v2 subgraph.testnet.yaml -l v2.0.0
scripts.deploy-local-testnet-lido: env-cmd --use-shell graph deploy --access-token '$AUTH_TOKEN_LIDO_TEST' --node '$GRAPH_NODE_LIDO_TEST' --ipfs '$GRAPH_IPFS_LIDO_TEST' --headers '$IPFS_AUTH_LIDO_TEST' lidofinance/lido-testnet-v2 subgraph.testnet.yaml -l v2.0.0
